data.title: Weekend at Bernie's (1989)
data.description: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

data.title: Raging Bull (1980)
data.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

data.title: Casino (1995)
data.description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

title: Twister (1996)

item_id: 278
title: Bed of Roses (1996)
genres: Drama and Romance
description: Romantic drama about a young career girl who is swept off her feet by a shy florist, who fell in love with her after one glimpse through a shadowy window.5. 
item_id: 472
title: Dragonheart (1996)
genres: Action, Adventure, and Fantasy
description: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.6. 
item_id: 473
title: James and the Giant Peach (1996)
genres: Animation, Children's, and Musical
description: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.7. 
item_id: 476
title: First Wives Club, The (1996)
genres: Comedy
description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.8. 
item_id: 756
title: Father of the Bride Part II (1995)
genres: Comedy
description: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.9. 
item_id: 764
title: If Lucy Fell (1996)
genres: Comedy and Romance
description: Two NYC roomies have a pact to jump off Brooklyn Bridge, if they haven't found life partners before she's 30. That's less than a month away.10. 
item_id: 820
title: Space Jam (1996)
genres: Adventure, Animation, Children's, Comedy, and Fantasy

title: Mulholland Falls (1996)

item_id: 926
title: Down Periscope (1996)

item_id: 934
title: Preacher's Wife, The (1996)

item_id: 952
title: Blue in the Face (1995)
genres: Comedy
description: Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn.15. 
item_id: 993
title: Hercules (1997)

item_id: 1001
title: Stupids, The (1996)

genres: Comedy

description: Continuing the story of Aurora Greenway in her latter years. After the death of her daughter, Aurora struggled to keep her family together, but has one grandson in jail, a rebellious granddaughter, and another grandson living just above the poverty line.
